entry.title: $1900 // AWESOME LOVLEY 1 BR_____SPACIOUS LIVING AREA_____GREAT LOCATION_____
entry.content:
This newly renovated apartment has beautiful hardwood flooring throughout, high ceilings, fully tiled bathroom, Stainless steel appliances.



Located near the R,F and G trains in South Slope this unit wont last.

FOR A VIEWING CALL HARRY show contact info

entry.title: $2700 // ☆ 3BR/1BA Wood Floors, Dishwasher - Sunset Park ☆
entry.content:
Contact info:
Richard Haviland | Barbara Puccia Realty | 347-987-1406

☆ 3BR/1BA Wood Floors, Dishwasher - Sunset Park ☆

425 43rd St, Brooklyn, NY 11232

$2,700/mo

KEY FEATURES
Bedrooms: 3
Bathrooms: 1 Full
Deposit: One Month's Security
Pets Policy: No Pets Please!

DESCRIPTION

Beautiful 3 bedroom floor-through brownstone with gorgeous finishes throughout, this is a spacious must see apartment. Large kitchen with dishwasher. Situated on the third floor on a lovely quiet tree lined street in the heart of Sunset Park.

The bedrooms overlook the surrounding rear grounds of botanical greenery as far as the eye can see, as well there are hints of city views as you look beyond the beautiful architecture and greenery of the Brooklyn views!

The 45th St stop on the N/R/W trains is just 2 blocks away and you are just 25 minutes to NYC! You are steps to Greenwood Heights and Park Slope, as well as, 1 block and steps to all cafes, shopping, gyms, don't miss this trendy cool location, it's the place to be.

No Pets Please!


Richard Haviland | Barbara Puccia Realty | 347-987-1406
Principals only. No brokers please!


Subject to error, omissions, changes and deletions without prior notice.

ID#8-0401

RENTAL FEATURES
  • Range / Oven
  • Refrigerator
  • Wood Floors
  • Dishwasher


Contact info:
Richard Haviland
Barbara Puccia Realty
347-987-1406

entry.title: $1995 // Park Slope Spacious 1 Bedroom + Office Near 5th Ave Cafes & Shops.
entry.content:
(Listing ID: cl-130845.1) (718) 930-7999


To view our walk through video, please visit our website at: http://destinationrealestate.com/listing?listing=9101-cl

This is a 1 Bedroom + Office in the Park Slope area of Brooklyn. The Apartment has Two ways to Enter: (1) Entry into the Kitchen and (2) Entry into the Bedroom. Apartment Features Hardwood Floors, Ceiling Fan, Lots of Closet Space and Storage. The Eat-in-Kitchen Features Tile Flooring, Tile Backsplash and Tin Ceiling. Includes Heat, Hot Water, and Gas. Small Dogs and Cats Accepted on Approval.

  • Bedroom 12x11
  • Living Area 13.5x13
  • Kitchen 12x12.5
  • Office 8x6.5
  • Bathroom 6.5x8

Living just blocks away from Prospect Park gives you unlimited access to all of what the park has to offer: Prospect Park Bandshell, Smorgasburg, the LeFrak Center, Prospect Park Carousel, Drummers Cove, the Prospect Park Zoo, Lefferts Historic House and the Brooklyn Botanical Garden just to name a few!

Enjoy other Parks and Greeneries such as Grand Army Plaza, Joseph Mayrose Park, Butterfly Gardens, Green space on 4th, and 6 15 Green.

Enjoy local attractions such as Brooklyn Glass, Gallery Players Theater, Greenwood Park Beer Garden, New York Sports Club, The End is Near, and Union Market. Local restaurants and bars include Giovanni's Brooklyn Eats, Black Horse Pub, Sea Witch and Terrace Bagels.

South Slope also includes dozens of bike paths for easy travel.

Subway access to the R train at Prospect Avenue, and the F and G trains at 7th Avenue. Commute is roughly 30 minutes to Midtown Manhattan.

Enjoy a more laid back environment than the heart of Park Slope, but enjoy all of the same amenities! South Slope also gives you quick and easy access into Northern Park Slope, Greenwood and Windsor Terrace

 

Walk Time to Nearest Train Stations

25th St (10 mins):     R

Where is this apartment in relation to other neighborhoods?North of Bay Ridge, Sunset Park, and Greenwood
South of Clinton Hill, Fort Greene, and Downtown Brooklyn
East of Red Hook, Carroll Gardens, Gowanus, Cobble Hill, Boerum Hill
West of Windsor Terrace and Prospect Heights

entry.title: $2495 // Park Slope 2 BR Spacious Master BR Pet-Friendly. High Ceilings!
entry.content:
(Listing ID: cl-150753.2) (718) 930-7999


To view our walk through video, please visit our website at: http://destinationrealestate.com/listing?listing=9107-cl

This is a 2 Bedroom, that can be Flexed into a 3 Bedroom, with Plenty of Natural Sunlight, Located in the Park Slope Area of Brooklyn. The Kitchen Features Tile Flooring, Tile Backsplash, and Plenty of Countertop and Cabinet Space for those who Love to Cook! The Apartment Features High Ceilings, a Double Closet, Hardwood Floors, and Dining Room that can be Converted into a Third Bedroom for those that are Ambitious! Includes Heat and Hot Water. Cats and Dogs Accepted on Approval.

  • Living Area 14x12
  • First Bedroom 11.5x17
  • Second Bedroom 7x11
  • Hallway 8x3
  • Dining Area 11x9 (Can be Flexed into Third Bedroom 7x8.5)
  • Kitchen 7x8.5

Located in the heart of Park Slope, this apartment gives you access to lots of great local parks, attractions, restaurants, cafes, and bars. 

Living just blocks away from Prospect Park gives you unlimited access to all of what the park has to offer: Prospect Park Bandshell, Smorgasburg, the LeFrak Center, Prospect Park Carousel, Drummers Cove, the Prospect Park Zoo, Lefferts Historic House and the Brooklyn Botanical Garden just to name a few!

Enjoy other Parks and Greeneries such as Joseph Mayrose Park, Butterfly Gardens, the 6 15 Green, and the Historic Old Stone House and Washington Park. Enjoy local attractions and stores such as Brooklyn Glass, Gallery Players Theater, YMCA, Brooklyn Ethical Culture Society, Beacon's Closet - Park Slope, Littlefield, Barnes & Noble, Park Slope Food Coop, Brooklyn Public Library, Community Bookstore, Whole Foods Market, and New York Sports Club. 

Local restaurants and bars include: Four and Twenty Blackbirds, The Owl Farm, Barbes, The Black Horse Pub, and Dizzy's. Nearby health centers include NY Methodist Hospital, located right off of 6th Street and 7th Avenue. 

Park Slope also includes dozens of bike paths for easy travel.Subway access to the F, G, and R trains at the 4th Avenue / 9th Street Station. Commute is roughly 30 minutes to Midtown Manhattan. Only 2 stops to Atlantic Avenue / Barclays Center on the R train!

Walk Time to Nearest Train Stations

25th St (10 mins):     R

9th St (12 mins):     F, G, R

4th Av (12 mins):     F, G

Where is this apartment in relation to other neighborhoods?North of Bay Ridge, Sunset Park, and Greenwood
South of Clinton Hill, Fort Greene, and Downtown Brooklyn
East of Red Hook, Carroll Gardens, Gowanus, Cobble Hill, Boerum Hill
West of Windsor Terrace and Prospect Heights
